Welcome, Consultant.

Your objective: Guide RetailFlow's AI chatbot pilot to success. This simulation is your proving ground for AI project management.

Your Role

Customer service is overwhelmed, with email response times at an unacceptable 26 hours. The solution is a high-stakes AI chatbot pilot project. Your role is to help manage this initiative, navigate the challenges, and lead it to success.

Current Situation Analysis

Customer Satisfaction (CSAT)

68%

Target: 78% | Declining

Email First Response

26 Hours

Target: < 4 Hours | Critical

Project Budget

AUD $150,000

Timeline: 6 Months

Your Mission Briefing

This isn't a simple "AI = good" story. Real implementation involves tradeoffs, competing priorities across the organization, and the risk of failure. Your task is to navigate this complexity.

Company Reconnaissance

Meet the executive team, understand their competing motivations, and review the company's financial health.

Dive into the chatbot project's goals, risks, and stakeholder map to understand the landscape.

Interactive Fieldwork

Engage with the AI bots and test your decision-making in realistic scenarios drawn from real customer issues.
